title: Weekend at Cradle Mountain
creator_credit: Tasmanian Council for Children's Films and Television, Children's Films and Television, Island Film Services, C Wolnizer and W. H. Perkins
brief_description: Shows the children of a family spending a weekend at the chalet in Cradle Mountain Reserve going on two long walks past the mountain lakes, life at the chalet, the chalet keeper and the ranger, and their native pets. Cast: Margaret, Marcus and Duncan. Commentary by Nan Chauncey.
creator_credit_for_label: Tasmanian Council for Children’s Films and Television, Children’s Films and Television, Island Film Services, C Wolnizer and W. H. Perkins
